alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 5:22PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...An area of thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Delta, northwestern Montrose, Mesa and southeastern Grand Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 520 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a large area of heavy showers and thunderstorms across eastern Utah and western Colorado. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Brief, torrential rain is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Grand Valley; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide
